Video Information.Title: Automating YouTube Analytics: Postman Flows & Google API Deep Dive
Video Information.Description:
In this week's Postman LIVE, Ian and Kevin are kicking off a new series that takes us through building an entire project from scratch using Postman. Follow along as we build an application that automates gathering YouTube Analytics from the Google YouTube API and stores them for processing in part one of this new three-part series.

Get notified when Postman goes live by following us on YouTube!
https://www.youtube.com/@postman

00:00 Introductions
05:30 In Case You Missed in
10:30 Setting up Google Project, choosing APIs
26:40 Creating/Storing credentials in a secure way in Postman, setting up OAuth2
56:30 Calling YouTube APIs
1:13:00 Working with the Google Sheets API
1:24:15 Wrap-up, shout-outs

Links from the stream:
- blog post about Google OAuth2: https://blog.postman.com/how-to-access-google-apis-using-oauth-in-postman/
